scripts.build: yarn && yarn workspace shared-core build && yarn workspace shared-components build && yarn workspace web build
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn now && yarn now alias
scripts.dev: yarn workspace shared-core clean && yarn workspace shared-components clean && yarn workspace shared-core build && yarn workspace shared-components build && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace shared-components build -W" "yarn workspace web start"  "yarn workspace mobile start"
scripts.patch-package: if test "$NOW" = "1"; then cd .; else patch-package; fi
